text:
「喔──。」 [redacted_name]低著頭如進行人體實驗的科學家般地緊盯著[redacted_name]的肉棒越來越小越來越小最後完全消失的過程。「 看來，魔藥的配方得再調整才行呢。」
「欸？？」 [redacted_name]發出困惑的聲音，看著自己用變回平滑胯下，一臉茫然。
「怎麼，覺得可惜嗎？」
「並、並不是……。」
「放心，不會有後遺症的。 應該啦。」 [redacted_name]的頭繼續低著。「 比起這個，」[redacted_name]抬起了頭，雙眼直視著[redacted_name]。 [redacted_name]發現自己[redacted_name]星夜般的瞳孔中正在颳著慾望的風暴。
trans:
"Oh──."[redacted_name] lowered his head like a scientist conducting human experiments and stared at the process of [redacted_name]'s cock getting smaller and smaller and finally disappearing completely. "It seems that the formula of the potion must be adjusted again."
"What??" [redacted_name] made a confused sound, looking at himself with a confused expression on his face as he transformed back into a smooth crotch.
"Why, do you think it's a pity?"
"No, it's not…"
Don't worry, there won't be any aftereffects. I think it will be fine. [redacted_name] kept his head down. "Compared to this," [redacted_name] raised his head and looked directly at [redacted_name]. [redacted_name] found that a storm of desire was brewing in his [redacted_name] starry eyes.
